isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly

note.para: If door has electrically controlled windows, door locks, mirrors, heated mirrors or CB antenna and door wiring harness was replaced, connect wiring harness connectors to install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly as described below.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 44 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Hold upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) at cab door and carefully feed each connector of cab door electrical cable (Item 1) through cab door hinge grommet and cab door hinge. Each connector will have to be fed through separately; pull electrical cable through completely.

Once cab door electrical cable (Item 1) has been pulled completely through cab door hinge grommet and cab door hinge, carefully feed each connector of cab door electrical cable through cab hinge pillar and plastic grommet into cab side panel. Each connector will have to be fed through separately.

Now carefully feed mirror electrical cable (Item 2) through opening in mirror mounting bracket and cab door (Item 4, Figure 42) . Each connector will have to be fed through separately. Pull electrical cable completely through cab door and mirror mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 43 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Hold upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door and install inner door handle control rod (Item 6) into door latch inner door handle control rod (Item 7) from door latch assembly (Item 4) and slide retaining clip (Item 5) onto inner door handle control rod to secure them together.
While holding upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door, connect cab door courtesy light switch connector (Item 8) to cab door courtesy light switch.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) over door lock control rod (Item 2) and slide down into position on cab door.
Hold upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) onto cab door and install six pan head torx screws (Item 11) securing it to cab door.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 42 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Connect electrical cable connectors (Item 2) as required, such as CB cable connector, and if so equipped, electric mirror and/or heated mirror connectors. Coil up excess cable and using a tywrap (Item 5) bundle them together so as to contain them inside lower mirror mounting bracket. Install lower mirror mounting bracket plastic cover (Item 1).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Through access opening in inner door panel (Item 6) install electric door lock control rod of electric door lock actuator (Item 9) into electric door lock control rod (Item 10) and slide retaining clip (Item 8) onto lock control rod of electric door lock actuator.
Install door lock knob (Item 1) onto door lock control rod (Item 2) sticking through opening in upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3).
Install two hex head mach. screws (Item 5) through oval opening in center of inner door panel (Item 6) securing window regulator assembly to window regulator bracket on window.

If vehicle window is manually operated, use window regulator handle (Item 2, Figure 35) and raise window and remove wood block (Item 7), 12.5 inches long, through opening in inner door panel (Item 6).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door check strap (Item 2) on cab door frame (Item 3) and install two pan head mach. screws (Item 1).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Carefully pull electrical cable and connectors (Item 1) through side of cab (Item 2) as far as it will go.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Reach under dash panel and connect courtesy light connector (Item 1) and CB cable connector (Item 2), if so equipped, connect electric window connector (Item 3) and electric door lock connector (Item 4). If vehicle is equipped with heated mirrors and/or electric mirrors, connect connectors for them also.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 37 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab side insulator panel (Item 6) on driver side in place and install one black plastic trim fastener (Item 7) in top flange, then install two self tapping pan head screws and washers (Item 8).
Position dimmer switch (Item 5) in place and install two pan head screws (Item 4) to secure it.

Position cab front insulator panel (Item 1) under instrument panel and install two black plastic trim fasteners (Item 2) in top flange, then install one self tapping pan head screw and washer (Item 3).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle has electric windows use electric window switch to raise window and remove wood block (Item 7), 12.5 inches long, through opening in inner door panel (Item 6).

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
